title: A fabric-based hydrovoltaic electricity generator with multi-component carbon black for sustainable energy output
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18832-18837
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02346C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yahua Liu, Bingzhong Xiao, Quanmao Wei, Zichao Yuan, Wenzhuo Song, Ling Zhou, Wenna Ge
Multi-component carbon black enhanced oxygen-containing functional density through a synergistic effect. The FWEG could generate electricity without any additional energy input and could be readily integrated to directly power calculators.
